t: Psalm 86
Prayer for Mercy, with Meditation on the Excellencies of the Lord
A Prayer of David.
Bow*pn down Your ear, O Lord,*s hear me; For*ld I am*i poor and needy.
Preserve*ld my life, for I am*i holy; You*ld are my God; Save*ld Your servant who trusts in You!
Be*ld merciful to me, O Lord, For*ld I cry to You all day long.
Rejoice*ld the soul of Your servant, For*ld to You, O Lord, I lift up my soul.
For*ld You, Lord, are*i good, and ready to forgive, And*ld abundant in mercy to all those who call upon You.
Give*ln ear, O Lord,*s to my prayer; And*ld attend to the voice of my supplications.
In*ld the day of my trouble I will call upon You, For*ld You will answer me.
Among*ln the gods there*i is*i none like You, O Lord; Nor*ld are*i there*i any*i works*i like Your works.
All*ld nations whom You have made Shall*ld come and worship before You, O Lord, And*ld shall glorify Your name.
For*ld You are*i great, and do wondrous things; You*ld alone are*i God.
Teach*ln me Your way, O Lord;*s I*ld will walk in Your truth; Unite*ld my heart to fear Your name.
I*ld will praise You, O Lord my God, with all my heart, And*ld I will glorify Your name forevermore.
For*ld great is*i Your mercy toward me, And*ld You have delivered my soul from the depths of Sheol.
O*ln God, the proud have risen against me, And*ld a mob of violent men*i have sought my life, And*ld have not set You before them.
But*ld You, O Lord, are*i a God full of compassion, and gracious, Longsuffering*ld and abundant in mercy and truth.
Oh,*ln turn to me, and have mercy on me! Give*ld Your strength to Your servant, And*ld save the son of Your maidservant.
Show*ld me a sign for good, That*ld those who hate me may see it*i and be ashamed, Because*ld You, Lord,*s have helped me and comforted me.
